title: Electronic Learning Environment Design for Complex Mathematics Learning: Supporting Individual and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Online learning environment design for in-service professionals to improve complex mathematical problem-solving skills, integrating individual and collaborative learning via an asynchronous LMS with project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative learning using collaboration tools in digital environments to solve complex math problems with over 80% accuracy
Learners can establish individual learning plans using digital resources in LMS and solve over three complex math problems
Learners can submit project deliverables meeting over 90% completion standards by incorporating peer feedback in online collaborative learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
